intro: Doliocarpus pulcher, commonly known as the beautiful doliocarpus, is a species of flowering plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its compound leaves and small, clustered flowers that are typically yellow or greenish-yellow in color. Its fruit is a small, woody capsule that contains several seeds. Doliocarpus pulcher is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
